singleItemContent: p>  Did you usually go to the cinema when you were a child?
p>  Do you often go to the cinema with your friends?
p>  Do you still like the same kind of movie which you liked when you were a child?
p>  Describe something that helped you learn a foreign language.
p>  What language did you learn?
p>  Why you chose to learn that language
p>  And explain how this thing helped you
p> What difficulties do people face when learning a language?
p> Do you think language learning is important?
p>  Is studying abroad a good way to learn a foreign language?
